title: Cricket Static Free Fast Flo
description: Eliminates fly aways that lead to stick up static hair. A great styler to sculpt hair the way you want during blow drying. Includes a rubber non slip grip for easier control. Long, plastic non snag bristles that won't tangle hair and are gentle on the scalp. Sculpt and style hair the way you want without worrying about unnecessary static and cling.

title: Cricket Hair Brush Static Free, Mini Fast Flo, 1.28 Ounce
description: Designed to dry hair in record time. Vent patterns and comfort ball tips make for super-quick drying, while reducing static and infusing ceramic and ion properties to add moisture to hair.

title: Suave Professionals Keratin Infusion Dry Shampoo, 5 Ounce
